text:
You must compile APR-Util with ldap support.

see: 
srclib/apr-util/configure --help

Look at adding the following to your configure line:
  --with-ldap-include=path  path to ldap include files with trailing slash
  --with-ldap-lib=path    path to ldap lib file
  --with-ldap=library     ldap library to use
creator: chip@force-elite.com
